TopicTitle: Mods I really want to update

Articles.Content:
Ok, so I have been putting up with a slew of mods that have NOT BEEN UPDATED for a year or more...

Custom Asteroids

EVE - Would like a redux of Better Atmospheres

EngineIgnitor

More mods that I will add later.

These are just the beginning of what will probably be a long list.

Anybody want to help? I honestly have no clue where to begin.

And yes, I overuse emoji.
You're in luckÃ¢â‚¬â€EVE has just updated, with what I believe is the development version which has been in the works for a good year now. The others, I'm not so sure on.

Yahooey! Now to download EVE! Say, are you good at developing plugins? I have the CustomAsteroids source downloaded, and I don't know what to do with it...

Yahooey! Now to download EVE! Say, are you good at developing plugins? I have the CustomAsteroids source downloaded, and I don't know what to do with it...

note.. this TBH is not the correct place to put your requests

On topic:

Better Atmospheres is kinda deprecated.

Me and V8jester are working to fix up Astronomer's visual pack.

Engine ignator... wait for sarbi (the person who makes ModuleManager.)
Complaining about someone not giving you free stuff quickly enough and in great enough quantity is generally frowned upon in these here parts.
